    9999             :     private:
   10000           0 :         class AssertionPrinter {
   10001             :             void operator= ( AssertionPrinter const& );
   10002             :         public:
   10003           0 :             AssertionPrinter( std::ostream& _stream, AssertionStats const& _stats, bool _printInfoMessages )
   10004           0 :             : stream( _stream )
   10005             :             , stats( _stats )
   10006             :             , result( _stats.assertionResult )
   10007             :             , messages( _stats.infoMessages )
   10008           0 :             , itMessage( _stats.infoMessages.begin() )
   10009           0 :             , printInfoMessages( _printInfoMessages )
   10010           0 :             {}
   10011             : 
   10012           0 :             void print() {
   10013           0 :                 printSourceInfo();
   10014             : 
   10015           0 :                 itMessage = messages.begin();
   10016             : 
   10017           0 :                 switch( result.getResultType() ) {
   10018           0 :                     case ResultWas::Ok:
   10019           0 :                         printResultType( Colour::ResultSuccess, passedString() );
   10020           0 :                         printOriginalExpression();
   10021           0 :                         printReconstructedExpression();
   10022           0 :                         if ( ! result.hasExpression() )
   10023           0 :                             printRemainingMessages( Colour::None );
   10024             :                         else
   10025           0 :                             printRemainingMessages();
   10026           0 :                         break;
   10027           0 :                     case ResultWas::ExpressionFailed:
   10028           0 :                         if( result.isOk() )
   10029           0 :                             printResultType( Colour::ResultSuccess, failedString() + std::string( " - but was ok" ) );
   10030             :                         else
   10031           0 :                             printResultType( Colour::Error, failedString() );
   10032           0 :                         printOriginalExpression();
   10033           0 :                         printReconstructedExpression();
   10034           0 :                         printRemainingMessages();
   10035           0 :                         break;
   10036           0 :                     case ResultWas::ThrewException:
   10037           0 :                         printResultType( Colour::Error, failedString() );
   10038           0 :                         printIssue( "unexpected exception with message:" );
   10039           0 :                         printMessage();
   10040           0 :                         printExpressionWas();
   10041           0 :                         printRemainingMessages();
   10042           0 :                         break;
   10043           0 :                     case ResultWas::FatalErrorCondition:
   10044           0 :                         printResultType( Colour::Error, failedString() );
   10045           0 :                         printIssue( "fatal error condition with message:" );
   10046           0 :                         printMessage();
   10047           0 :                         printExpressionWas();
   10048           0 :                         printRemainingMessages();
   10049           0 :                         break;
   10050           0 :                     case ResultWas::DidntThrowException:
   10051           0 :                         printResultType( Colour::Error, failedString() );
   10052           0 :                         printIssue( "expected exception, got none" );
   10053           0 :                         printExpressionWas();
   10054           0 :                         printRemainingMessages();
   10055           0 :                         break;
   10056           0 :                     case ResultWas::Info:
   10057           0 :                         printResultType( Colour::None, "info" );
   10058           0 :                         printMessage();
   10059           0 :                         printRemainingMessages();
   10060           0 :                         break;
   10061           0 :                     case ResultWas::Warning:
   10062           0 :                         printResultType( Colour::None, "warning" );
   10063           0 :                         printMessage();
   10064           0 :                         printRemainingMessages();
   10065           0 :                         break;
   10066           0 :                     case ResultWas::ExplicitFailure:
   10067           0 :                         printResultType( Colour::Error, failedString() );
   10068           0 :                         printIssue( "explicitly" );
   10069           0 :                         printRemainingMessages( Colour::None );
   10070           0 :                         break;
   10071             :                     // These cases are here to prevent compiler warnings
   10072           0 :                     case ResultWas::Unknown:
   10073             :                     case ResultWas::FailureBit:
   10074             :                     case ResultWas::Exception:
   10075           0 :                         printResultType( Colour::Error, "** internal error **" );
   10076           0 :                         break;
   10077             :                 }
   10078           0 :             }

   10086             :             static const char* failedString() { return "FAILED"; }
   10087             :             static const char* passedString() { return "PASSED"; }

   10090           0 :             static const char* passedString() { return "passed"; }

   10094           0 :                 Colour colourGuard( Colour::FileName );

   10096           0 :             }
   10097             : 
   10098           0 :             void printResultType( Colour::Code colour, std::string passOrFail ) const {
   10099           0 :                 if( !passOrFail.empty() ) {
   10100             :                     {
   10101           0 :                         Colour colourGuard( colour );
   10102           0 :                         stream << " " << passOrFail;
   10103             :                     }
   10104           0 :                     stream << ":";
   10105             :                 }
   10106           0 :             }
   10107             : 
   10108           0 :             void printIssue( std::string issue ) const {
   10109           0 :                 stream << " " << issue;
   10110           0 :             }
   10111             : 
   10112           0 :             void printExpressionWas() {
   10113           0 :                 if( result.hasExpression() ) {
   10114           0 :                     stream << ";";
   10115             :                     {
   10116           0 :                         Colour colour( dimColour() );
   10117           0 :                         stream << " expression was:";
   10118             :                     }
   10119           0 :                     printOriginalExpression();
   10120             :                 }
   10121           0 :             }
   10122             : 
   10123           0 :             void printOriginalExpression() const {
   10124           0 :                 if( result.hasExpression() ) {
   10125           0 :                     stream << " " << result.getExpression();
   10126             :                 }
   10127           0 :             }
   10128             : 
   10129           0 :             void printReconstructedExpression() const {
   10130           0 :                 if( result.hasExpandedExpression() ) {
   10131             :                     {
   10132           0 :                         Colour colour( dimColour() );
   10133           0 :                         stream << " for: ";
   10134             :                     }
   10135           0 :                     stream << result.getExpandedExpression();
   10136             :                 }
   10137           0 :             }
   10138             : 
   10139           0 :             void printMessage() {
   10140           0 :                 if ( itMessage != messages.end() ) {
   10141           0 :                     stream << " '" << itMessage->message << "'";
   10142           0 :                     ++itMessage;
   10143             :                 }
   10144           0 :             }
   10145             : 
   10146           0 :             void printRemainingMessages( Colour::Code colour = dimColour() ) {
   10147           0 :                 if ( itMessage == messages.end() )
   10148           0 :                     return;
   10149             : 
   10150             :                 // using messages.end() directly yields compilation error:
   10151           0 :                 std::vector<MessageInfo>::const_iterator itEnd = messages.end();
   10152           0 :                 const std::size_t N = static_cast<std::size_t>( std::distance( itMessage, itEnd ) );
   10153             : 
   10154             :                 {
   10155           0 :                     Colour colourGuard( colour );
   10156           0 :                     stream << " with " << pluralise( N, "message" ) << ":";
   10157             :                 }
   10158             : 
   10159           0 :                 for(; itMessage != itEnd; ) {
   10160             :                     // If this assertion is a warning ignore any INFO messages
   10161           0 :                     if( printInfoMessages || itMessage->type != ResultWas::Info ) {
   10162           0 :                         stream << " '" << itMessage->message << "'";
   10163           0 :                         if ( ++itMessage != itEnd ) {
   10164           0 :                             Colour colourGuard( dimColour() );
   10165           0 :                             stream << " and";
   10166             :                         }
   10167             :                     }
   10168             :                 }
   10169             :             }
   10170             : 
   10171             :         private:
   10172             :             std::ostream& stream;
   10173             :             AssertionStats const& stats;
   10174             :             AssertionResult const& result;
   10175             :             std::vector<MessageInfo> messages;
   10176             :             std::vector<MessageInfo>::const_iterator itMessage;
   10177             :             bool printInfoMessages;
   10178             :         };
   10179             : 
   10180             :         // Colour, message variants:
   10181             :         // - white: No tests ran.
   10182             :         // -   red: Failed [both/all] N test cases, failed [both/all] M assertions.
   10183             :         // - white: Passed [both/all] N test cases (no assertions).
   10184             :         // -   red: Failed N tests cases, failed M assertions.
   10185             :         // - green: Passed [both/all] N tests cases with M assertions.
   10186             : 
   10187           0 :         std::string bothOrAll( std::size_t count ) const {
   10188           0 :             return count == 1 ? "" : count == 2 ? "both " : "all " ;
   10189             :         }
   10190             : 
   10191           0 :         void printTotals( const Totals& totals ) const {
   10192           0 :             if( totals.testCases.total() == 0 ) {
   10193           0 :                 stream << "No tests ran.";
   10194             :             }
   10195           0 :             else if( totals.testCases.failed == totals.testCases.total() ) {
   10196           0 :                 Colour colour( Colour::ResultError );
   10197             :                 const std::string qualify_assertions_failed =
   10198           0 :                     totals.assertions.failed == totals.assertions.total() ?
   10199           0 :                         bothOrAll( totals.assertions.failed ) : "";
   10200           0 :                 stream <<
   10201           0 :                     "Failed " << bothOrAll( totals.testCases.failed )
   10202           0 :                               << pluralise( totals.testCases.failed, "test case"  ) << ", "
   10203           0 :                     "failed " << qualify_assertions_failed <<
   10204           0 :                                  pluralise( totals.assertions.failed, "assertion" ) << ".";
   10205             :             }
   10206           0 :             else if( totals.assertions.total() == 0 ) {
   10207           0 :                 stream <<
   10208           0 :                     "Passed " << bothOrAll( totals.testCases.total() )
   10209           0 :                               << pluralise( totals.testCases.total(), "test case" )
   10210           0 :                               << " (no assertions).";
   10211             :             }
   10212           0 :             else if( totals.assertions.failed ) {
   10213           0 :                 Colour colour( Colour::ResultError );
   10214           0 :                 stream <<
   10215           0 :                     "Failed " << pluralise( totals.testCases.failed, "test case"  ) << ", "
   10216           0 :                     "failed " << pluralise( totals.assertions.failed, "assertion" ) << ".";
   10217             :             }
   10218             :             else {
   10219           0 :                 Colour colour( Colour::ResultSuccess );
   10220           0 :                 stream <<
   10221           0 :                     "Passed " << bothOrAll( totals.testCases.passed )
   10222           0 :                               << pluralise( totals.testCases.passed, "test case"  ) <<
   10223           0 :                     " with "  << pluralise( totals.assertions.passed, "assertion" ) << ".";
   10224             :             }
   10225           0 :         }
   10226             :     };
   10227             : 
   10228           1 :     INTERNAL_CATCH_REGISTER_REPORTER( "compact", CompactReporter )
   10229             : 
   10230             : } // end namespace Catch
